bibl.title: [Telegram?] from Hugh S. Cumming to M.S. Lombard, September 15, 1922

div1.p: Cumming advises Lombard on a possible yellow fever case at Mobile, Alabama.

div1.head: [Telegram?] from Hugh S. Cumming to M.S. Lombard, September 15, 1922
div1.opener:
FAST DAY MESSAGE
September 15, 1922.
Lombard
Quarantine
Fort Morgan Alabama
div1.p:
Bureau has no information concerning existence yellow fever
Paramaribo or Mungo but deal with conditions as you find them
treating case as yellow fever unless proven to be something else
div1.closer:
(Signed) CUMMING
Public Health Service BJL/LAR
True Copy
LAR 11/6/22
